deploy.startCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; echo "[railway] boot diagnostics"; echo "[railway] pwd=$(pwd)"; echo "[railway] ls:"; ls -la; if [ -d nextjs_space ]; then echo "[railway] cd nextjs_space"; cd nextjs_space; fi; echo "[railway] pwd=$(pwd)"; echo "[railway] node=$(node -v)"; echo "[railway] npm=$(npm -v)"; echo "[railway] PORT=${PORT:-}"; echo "[railway] starting app..."; npm run start'
